ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations
ygData.msgSnippet: You will be disappointed I fear.  The proc is a level 8 wizard spell that does 28 points of AoE damage centered on the user.  Can you say demezmerizing
ygData.messageBody:
You will be disappointed I fear. The proc is a level 8 wizard spell that
does 28 points of AoE damage centered on the user. Can you say
demezmerizing mega-taunt? I thought you could.

At least its great if you get surrounded by a horde of moss snakes you
couldn't Lullaby while doing some testing to prove just that.

Kitasi


Got one...WOOOO! It was a rare drop from a Guildmate, so I have no idea
where it came from.

5/18
Effect: Fingers of Fire
Wt: 2.8
Class BRD

So, does anyone know what the effect is? And I was fighting in SolA last
night with it, I am not sure but I *think* it never proc'd. Does anyone one
know if there is a level at which it starts?


Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 30
